body_html: Eh I'm really feeling like dropping all this temporal/spatial/volumetric thing from THNN. This would make refactoring much easier. We should rethink the future of this library, because it's a terrible pain to maintain, but it needs some discussion. I'm fine with dropping them wherever. It's just usually a good idea to try to not stuff Python with too many checks, because it's super slow compared to C
